numerical module¶

numerical.DFT(wavef, realdft=True)¶

Function to compute the discrete Fourier transform of the given function. :param wavef: The data with time data in the first row and the real or complex-valued vectors in the following rows. :type wavef: numpy array, real or complex :param realdft: Denotes if only positive frequency components of the DFT are returned. :type realdft: bool

Returns

The energy grid points of the Fourier-transformed function and the Fourier-transformed function.

Return type

numpy array, real; numpy array, complex

numerical.aucofu(wavef)¶

Function to compute the autocorrelation function from the given vectors (with respect to the first time step). :param wavef: The wave function over time. :type wavef: numpy array, complex

Returns

The autocorrelation function over time.

Return type

numpy array, complex

numerical.calc_auto(wavef)¶

Helper function to compute the vector overlap. :param wavef: The wave function over time. :type wavef: numpy array, complex

Returns

The autocorrelation function over time.

Return type

numpy array, complex
